data.text: @DeanoLFC @markgoldbridge Ok enjoy “high press winning football”
@markgoldbridge Old days when UTD classes that as a bad season yet Jose classes that as a good season https://t.co/d8dVE6xXKu

@markgoldbridge Am sure mourinho needs to keep believing if things would change as a man is defeated when he starts doubting himself...mark u can fuck off because u are an English average prick urself.

@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge To that there is many. Mourinho would of got rid of more if he’d of been backed and given the time needed. There’s huge question marks over some of the boards decisions lately and that ain’t gonna change with a new manager.
@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge For any manager to succeed  at United he has to first transfer  all the deadwoods in the team and identify  the areas united need to fix n buy accordingly ...

@markgoldbridge @AmaCadd So what do you expect him to say Mark? He was only trying to let them realize that MUFC appointed him because they knew he was big enough to manage the club. And if you say Jose is no longer great bcos of recent results, then so is MUFC unfortunately. And Jose will not take that.
@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge Sacked today *

@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge If mourinho was sacked to the new manager will already be in a mess. Utds cbs are atrocious. Bailly was brilliant in his first season but has been awful since his injury, smalling ain’t good enough neither is lindelof and rojo and jones are donkeys
@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge I don't think  so with the appointment  of dof  in line,  I do not  believe  the next  manager will be in any mess...
@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge That’s the point. The board knew who they were hiring and haven’t backed him. I feel for the next manager as he won’t be fully back when the tough gets going.

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge Moving forward  I hope united  don't make  mistake in appointing manager again  in the future . our next manager should  be someone  who understands  the tradition  n history  behind  our great club n also play united way...

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge Though I believe  the board need  to back him and can't  turn  their  backs on him now but insist his appointment  was panic  reaction n unnecessary  cos we all know  what Jose brings  on board..
@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge But that’s what united got in mourinho. The board knew it and the fans knew it. The can’t change its mind and not back him half way through the deal.
@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge But united don't need a cheque  book manager only...  They need  a manager who can develop  players as well  not always  buying big..

@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge He has some of the blame alright but not it all. In his first season he broke records of the longest unbeaten run most clean sheets and the first manager to win not one but 2 trophies. He’s a cheque book manager and united backed him for the first year but not since.

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge Don't you think united problem  is not entirely  the board but the coach too?  cos you  mentioned  players  Jose brought n were doing well but not now due to injury or something  else

@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge Matic has been good pogba not so much but he’s still utds best midfielder. Lukaku scored 27 goals last season his best ever season, zlatan was a beast with 28 goals, mkhi was good then went off the boil, bailly had a great fist season not great after his injury. Not to shabby.
@BikeBulgaria @kenandemirsay @markgoldbridge He parked the bus and bored the arse off everyone, if that it was he describes as his greatest achievement then he has gone mad
@kenandemirsay @BikeBulgaria @markgoldbridge Celebrating mediocrity - how far the mighty have fallen

@RocBoiJJ @markgoldbridge Do #MUFC fans give a shit about his 8 titles ! They want success not a manger that had been successful elsewhere. United are no nearer to winning a title than with Moyes or Van Hal & playing dour football gives the fans nothing to look forward to #JoseIn

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge Why should  ed payed  for a player near his 30's and don't have  any revalue  ...the board  isn't to blame entirely  for the mess. Jose  has to blame too cos most of the players  he bought haven't be the best so far ...

@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge Players like zlatan, pogba, mkhi, lukaku, matic, Sanchez came so I don’t believe players didn’t come cos of that. Perisic was coming last year but dead ed wouldn’t pay the extra 5 million inter wanted. The board is to blame for this mess.

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge What if the players  didn't want  come here  cos there was rumour  that some of the players  approached don't want play  for us and not sure the broad is to be blamed  if those rumour  was true.
@soumyajeetghosh @markgoldbridge Porto/Aberdeen, think you need to lay off the crystal meth sweetheart.
@markgoldbridge Goldbridge got an agenda now and using his swing to turn fans against jose, gwt behind the gaffer mate

@markgoldbridge Do you want him to not acknowledge his obviously great resume which very few can hope to match? 

Winning a CL with Porto is as incredible as winning it with a team like Aberdeen :) Managers who do that deserve respect

@markgoldbridge Why do you fucken hate mourinho so much that everything he says irritates you. Who do you think you are? What do you know about football.? Go and look job and stop relying on social media to pay your bills.
@markgoldbridge It may be self-absorbed... but he's also right!
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC In Mourinho World - sounding more Trump like each day.

@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge We don’t know for sure who utd were really after. All summer the press were telling us utd were chasing Alderweireld but poch and spurs totally denied it. Successful clubs back the manager and his decisions.

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge No one is interfering  him and sure if he makes  right decision  on whose comes  in and goes , the board  will support  him 100%  and not sure any club  will allow  it's coach to sell a 22 years old player with  potential  and bring in 29 years  old player past his prime ..

@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC Mark, its self absorBED not self absorbent. He's not wrong either though. The reason he is a manager of one of the biggest clubs in the world is because he is the most decorated manager still in management. If you're Mourinho out, say it. #MourinhoIn
@DanielG23145034 @markgoldbridge Thanks Daniel , Brent the forest fan is also the biggest armchair united fan too ... god love him ... he’s special 😉
@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge When the board decides who the manager buys or sells the club has a major problem. No club wins the league with that kinda interference.
@kenandemirsay @markgoldbridge Yeah he did no idea how but don’t think he is going to this season
@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge Am sure the board would  have  backed  him if he had made the right target not someone  like Jerome boateng  who's not only injury prone  but past his prime too
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC People please , he has always been like this ! Have you not paid attention till now?

@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge Bailly was great on his first season not so much now since his injury, lindelof looks like the badge is to heavy for him. Klopp bought karius and klavan but replaced them and will challenge for the title after the board back him with over 170 million this summer.
@markgoldbridge He’s stating facts mark
@markgoldbridge Man you just keep on keeping on. Your proudly relentless at finding spin. I think you’ll be snapped up by a tabloid soon if not already. Good luck with your endeavours.

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge Nobody is disputing  the fact that  he's not a great manager  but  how do you trust  someone  who's  yet to bring  the best  out of two  defence  he bought again with money to go n buy  other defenders?
@lisababe2346 @markgoldbridge He is, he took utd as far as he could in the league last season and needed to strengthen the defence which the board refused.
@markgoldbridge So Mark, you don’t like Jose?
@BikeBulgaria @markgoldbridge Finished above Klop and Pochetino last season.

@markgoldbridge This presser was blowing my trumpet presser. The part where he was asked to convey his feelings abt united his ans was wrong. But when he was directly asked if he is one of the best manager even of he dont win a title the ans to that was bullshit.

@markgoldbridge Self absorbent and also true. Asked questions but a industry that said liverpool fans stole from their own dead and Sam Alydice said how you could get round transfer rules. Hardly best journalists in the world.
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC Has been!
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC More accurately :  I WAS one of the greatest managers in the world!
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC Fuckoff man stop spreading negativity!😒
@markgoldbridge Mourinho: “I am the manager of one of the greatest clubs in the world but I am also one of the greatest managers in the world. I won eight titles, eight proper titles.” #mufc
@markgoldbridge It would be his biggest achievements- winning a title with Phil jones Ashley Young and Fellaini in the team ......would go down in history as one of the best managers ever

@APACHE11111 @markgoldbridge Yes we all agreed  he is one best manager in the world  n that's why he was appointed by Manchester United  but for christ  sake he should  let us see his best managerial acumen  on united..
@markgoldbridge I takes great insight and true love for MU to understand @markgoldbridge speaks the truth .....
@markgoldbridge Actually he’s reminding people of his credibility seeing as how MAJORITY of fans discredit him HOURLY!
@markgoldbridge He’s merely pointing out that there isn’t a more accomplished manager out there and don’t say Zidane because he inherited CR7 and Co not Young and Valencia
@markgoldbridge His ego is too high
@sunnybehal46 Don't mention yourself. The question was about United not him
@AmaCadd That was a different question clown! Don't question me when I'm typing the answers out as he answers the question
@Nanayaw3nity @UnitedStandMUFC That's exactly what he said in answer to that question. So shove your context where the sun don't shine
@markgoldbridge Well he’s right he’s managing one of the biggest clubs in the World and he’s one of the best managers in the world.
@markgoldbridge Was one of the best managers......

@markgoldbridge Tell me what you expected “I manage the biggest club and I think I’m ok???” When LvG and Moyes spoke like that we chastised them for it and now we’re chastising Mou for speaking with pride??! Fuck off
@markgoldbridge Oh dear it all ends on Sunday

@markgoldbridge Do you ask (can you win the title?) to the manager that finished third in the Premier League last season? To the manager that finished fourth?' #mufc show the full quote don’t cut it to suit your opinion ....
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC I think it is the perfect answer! Give him the season if starts Platini more attacking as last game! #mourinhoin #strongerunited
@markgoldbridge Think his bigger than united
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC Complete what he said. What was the full statement. Stop taking stuff out of context.
@markgoldbridge Everything is about him
@markgoldbridge @UnitedStandMUFC It is SO Clear! Him and his reputation first, ManU later! Smh
@markgoldbridge back the manager ...
@markgoldbridge Always about himself he needs getting rid off he’s like a poison
@markgoldbridge Are you saying he isn't correct ?
@markgoldbridge All in his head.
@markgoldbridge One can't but agree tbh
@markgoldbridge He is correct though!
@markgoldbridge History wise yes agreed
@markgoldbridge Just a Special One answer
@markgoldbridge Confidence
